body.p: An investment entity may also participate in the following investment-related activities, either directly or through a subsidiary, if these activities are undertaken to maximise the investment return (capital appreciation or investment income) from its investees and do not represent a separate substantial business activity or a separate substantial source of income to the investment entity:

li.p: providing management services and strategic advice to an investee; and
providing financial support to an investee, such as a loan, capital commitment or guarantee.
